message.name: SERVER_UPDATE
message.value: Server is updating, try again later

message.name: ERROR_SAVING
message.value: An error occurred during data saving. Transaction was cancelled.

message.name: ERROR_SOCIAL
message.value: An error occurred during access to API of social network.

message.name: ERROR_SOCIAL_OP
message.value: An error occurred during access to API of social network. {error}

message.name: ERROR_SCENE_LOAD
message.value: An error occurred during data loading (id = {id})

message.name: ERROR_HACKING_ATTEMPT
message.value: Not enough money. Transaction was cancelled.

message.name: ERROR_REQUEST_FRIEND_TO_BATTLE
message.value: You can not call this player to battle.

message.name: ERROR_BANK_FAIL
message.value: Transaction failed, possibly due to the high server load. Please, try again later.

message.name: UNSYNCH_ERROR
message.value: Desync. The command {received} came instead of {expected}.

message.name: BUY_RUBIES_SUCCESSFULL
message.value: Thanks for the purchase. We are at your disposal!

message.name: BUY_2_HAT
message.value: You have just bought the hat. Are you sure you want to change it?

message.name: BUY_SUCCESSFUL
message.value: The items are bought. They are at your armory.

message.name: BUY_REACTION_RATES
message.value: Now your reaction is increased by {count}

dictionary.message: Online fights. Ladies and gentlemen! Stake on your victory! Fight organizer takes 20% of income.
Select a friend, who will be your partner in this battle.

message.name: ARENA_DELAY_DESC
message.value: You may get back to your missions in:

message.name: ARENA_DELAY_DONT_WAIT
message.value: Don't want to wait? Lust for battle?

message.name: ARENA_BUY_BATTLE
message.value: You may buy one more battle

message.name: ARENA_BUY_FIVE_BATTLES
message.value: You may buy 5 battles at once:

message.name: HOT_SEAT_CARD_DESC
message.value: Play with your friends on a single computer! Just select one - and fight!

message.name: UNKNOWN_CARD_DESC
message.value: This mission is too secret to reveal it right now!

message.name: BOSS_LOCKED
message.value: Now you can not attack this boss, because he did not have cleared the way for him!

message.name: BOSS_UNAVAILABLE_TITLE
message.value: You're brave! But that alone is not enough!

message.name: BOSS_UNAVAILABLE_DESC
message.value: You are too low level to enter into such a serious battle!

message.name: CAN_NOT_ADD_IN_GROUP
message.value: You can't have more team members on the current level now.

message.name: REMOVE_FROM_GROUP_CONFIRMATION
message.value: Are you sure you want to kick your friend from the team?

message.name: ALREADY_IN_TEAM
message.value: The friend is already in the team

dictionary.message:
Only attack and armor is reset.
Reaction rate remains unchanged.

Points can be distributed anew.
<font color="#524336">Points available:</font> <font color="#A20000"> {points} </font>

message.name: NO_POINTS
message.value: There are no points to improve parameters

message.name: ARMOR_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Damage done to you is diminished depending on your armor

message.name: ATTACK_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Damage done to your enemy is increased depending on your attack

message.name: REACTION_DESCRIPTION
message.value: Increases the chance of getting the first turn in the duel. Reaction rate can be pumped by the friends that visit your house, or purchased for rubies

message.name: LEVEL_NET_ENOUGH_FOR_SEARCH
message.value: You may search in friend's room only after he has reached the second level

message.name: REACTION_MENU_MSG_NONE_PUMPED_3DAYS
message.value: Your reaction hasn't been pumped for the last 3 days

message.name: ALBUM_DESCRIPTION
message.value: My best moments in Wormix! Come in, let's fight: {app_link}

dictionary.message:
Attention!
Restriction of the video clip 15Mb.
The larger your video is, the longer it will take to upload on your page.
You have an unsaved video.
Size: {value} Mb

message.name: VIDEO_SAVE_QUESTION
message.value: Upload a video on your page?

message.name: VIDEO_SAVING_DESC
message.value: It will take you about 2 minutes to upload the video with the size of 15 Mb and with the internet speed of 1 Mb/s.

message.name: GO_AT_BANK
message.value: You can purchase fuzzes and rubies in a bank

message.name: BANK_INCOME_PAYMENT_RUBY
message.value: Icoming payment received. {count} rubies added to your account

message.name: BANK_INCOME_PAYMENT_COIN
message.value: Icoming payment received. {count} fuzzes added to your account

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_MSG
message.value: Please wait while server is choosing your opponent

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_BUSY
message.value: The player is in the middle of a combat and can't accept your request

message.name: BATTLE_LOGIN_TIMEOUT
message.value: Connection time to pvp server is exceeded, the fight was cancelled

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_NOT_ONLINE
message.value: Your friend is out of game

message.name: PVP_SERVER_CONNECTION_CLOSED
message.value: Game was disconnected from PVP server

message.name: ENTER_ID_FRIEND_IS_NOT_FRIEND
message.value: You've entered ID of a user that is not your friend

dictionary.message:
Connection to server is lost.
Please update the page.

message.name: PVP_SERVER_PROFILACTIC_WORK
message.value: Technical works are carried out on the pvp server

message.name: PVP_BATTLE_STUCK
message.value: The fight was cancelled by the server, as there was no opponent activity for a long time

message.name: PVP_BATTLE_UNSYNC
message.value: The fight was cancelled cause of desync errors

message.name: PVP_SERVER_DOWN
message.value: PvP server is going to be reloaded. All wagers will be refunded.

message.name: CURRENT_USER_ALREADY_IN_BATTLE
message.value: You're already in combat. Try to resend a request a bit later. If you see this error again, please, reload the game.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_BANNED
message.value: The friend you are requesting is banned.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_CLIENT_ERROR
message.value: Your friend wasn't able to accept your request.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_DISCONNECTED
message.value: Connection to PvP server failed during the request.

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_FRIEND_LACKS_MONEY
message.value: Your friend doesn't have enough money to join you!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_FRIEND_LACKS_LEVEL
message.value: Your friend's level is too low!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: Your friend doesn't have any battles remaining!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_MISSION_LOCKED
message.value: This boss isn't available for your friend!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_PLAYER_LACKS_LEVEL
message.value: Your level is too low for this battle!

message.name: BATTLE_REQUEST_PLAYER_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: You don't have any battles remaining!

dictionary.message: Error in game protocol.

The fight was cancelled because of the low performance.
Perhaps you switched to another browser tab for some time.

The fight was cancelled because of the low performance.
Perhaps you switched to another browser tab or used client acceleration.

The fight was cancelled because of the lack of commands from the client.
Combat log was saved on the server.
Количество:

message.name: CHAT_CALL_TO_PVP
message.value: wants to call you for a fight!

message.name: EXIT_BATTLE_MSG
message.value: Do you really want to surrender?

message.name: VIRAL_QUESTION_NEW_TEAMMATE
message.value: Tell your friend that you took him to the team?

message.name: VIRAL_QUESTION_ENEMY_LOSED
message.value: Leave a reminder of your victory?

message.name: VIRAL_ENEMY_LOSED
message.value: You lose in a fair fight! Do you want to take revenge?

message.name: VIRAL_QUESTION_PUMP_REACTION_POST
message.value: Ask your friend to pump the reaction in response?

message.name: VIRAL_PUMPQUESTION_EMPTYLIST
message.value: You haven't picked anyone to ask for reaction pumping.

message.name: SEARCH_QTIP
message.value: Be the first to search your friend as he reaches {N} level and get a ruby!

dictionary.message:
Wind speed and direction
Some kinds of weapon are influenced by the wind

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_TODAY_ALREADY
message.value: You can increase friend's reaction rate only once per day.

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_ERROR
message.value: You cannot increase your own reaction rate!

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_DAY_LIMIT
message.value: The daily limit of reaction pumping is reached.

message.name: PUMP_REACTION_DAY_LIMIT_ADD
message.value: You increased reaction rate for {count} friends from the chosen list.

message.name: WIPE_PROFILE_ACCESS
message.value: Profile reset is available only from 10 level!

message.name: WIPE_PROFILE_DAILY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
message.value: Daily limit exceeded, please try to restart tomorrow

message.name: WIPE_PROFILE_TODAY_ALREADY_WIPED
message.value: You're able to reset the profile once a day only

message.name: WIPE_PROFILE_ENTER_SMS_CODE
message.value: Please enter the received code into "SMS code" field

message.name: WIPE_PROFILE_SUCCESS
message.value: Profile is successfully wiped, please refresh the page (F5)

message.name: DESCR_LOWER_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: In the world of Wormix there are no secrets or tricks. Opponents respect each other and don't cheat. Do you believe this? Really? This is your league. You are a novice.

message.name: DESCR_VETERAN_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Since now you know that Wormix's secret is a really big gun.

message.name: DESCR_MASTER_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Willpower - that's what makes difference between master and novice. Only the incredible willpower keeps you from gloating, while pushing your enemy into the water on the first turn.

message.name: DESCR_ACE_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: You choose the weapon not just to win but to make it spectacular.

message.name: DESCR_RUBY_RATING_LEAGUE
message.value: Only stars are higher than you. And underneath there are stars too. Because it is the Ruby league - everyone is a star here.

dictionary.message:
Congratulations!
Read more in the official group {wormix_club_text}

message.name: DAILY_BONUS_TEXT
message.value: Visit us every day to keep the bonus streak!

message.name: NEED_RUBY_BUTTON2_TEXT
message.value: Be the first to search his house!

message.name: NEED_RUBY_CHECKBOX_TEXT
message.value: I don't need free rubies, don't show this window again

message.name: NO_FIVE_DAY_DESCR
message.value: Your friend hasn't entered the game for more than 2 months! Unfortunately, you haven't found anything.

message.name: RACE_UNAVAILABLE
message.value: Selection of this race is not allowed

message.name: RACE_BOXER_DESCR
message.value: Soldiers, whose health is tempered in fights. Legends are told about hardness of their skulls

message.name: RACE_DEMON_DESCR
message.value: Demons are cruel soldiers, devoted to their mater, they don't know mercy.

message.name: RACE_RABBIT_DESCR
message.value: Rabbits are fast as lightning. Their belief in the Great Carrot allows them to heal their wounds right on the battlefield.

message.name: RACE_ZOMBIE_DESCR
message.value: Zombies - living corpses controlled by the alien will. Emotionless, resistant to pain, they'll bring you total victory.

message.name: RACE_CAT_DESCR
message.value: Cats are cunning and skillful tricksters, they always have something in their sleeves to surpirse the enemy.

dictionary.message: Nobody believed in them. Everyone thought they were simply a fairy tale. But they returned, wielding fire! Real. Flying ... Dragons!
A character gets permanent <b>{armor} points to armor</b
Permanent {hpPct}% health bonus

message.name: ABILITY_UNDERWATER_DESCR
message.value: A hero drowns until it has ground under

dictionary.message: Poison deals {value}% more damage
Rabbits move faster than other races and jump much higher. To perform double jump, press the key twice
When greatly damaged, rabbit nervously gnaws a carrot, restoring hit points at the end of each turn of its team.
Enemies slain by zombie return from the graves to fight their former comrades!
It's bad idea to try to destroy zombies by regular bullets! All damage done to them is reduced by {dmgReduction}.
When zombie is killed, a bolt of negative energy is unleashed upon its slayer. The bolt does minor damage and places a poison.
Cats can climb any walls! Press the jump key twice to take hold.
When the cat is running out of health, it gets a chance to avoid any damage.

message.name: ABILITY_FLYING_DESCR
message.value: Dragon can upswing into the air and soar for a long distance.

message.name: ABILITY_FIERY_PACE_DESCR
message.value: Dragon leaves a trail of embers which ignite on the next turn, damaging any enemy that steps on them. Ignited embers also heal dragon and his team.

message.name: GIRDER_IMPOSSIBLE
message.value: Girder can't be placed on the ground or in the vicinity of any units

message.name: BANDAGE_USELESS
message.value: Bandage is useless at the moment!

message.name: ALREADY_ANTITOXIN
message.value: Antitoxin's already used on this unit!

dictionary.message:
My team: {my_team_descr}.
Enemy team: {opponent_team_descr}.

message.name: NOTE_ADD_SUCCESS
message.value: The note has been successfully saved and it will appear on your page

message.name: NOTE_ADD_ERROR
message.value: An error occurred while saving your note

message.name: SYSPVP_INACTIVITY_DROP
message.value: Player %1 is dropped due to inactivity

message.name: SYSPVP_UNCONFIRMED_EOT
message.value: Player %1 hasn't confirmed end of turn

message.name: SYSPVP_LONG_TURN
message.value: Time limit for a turn is going to be exceeded!

message.name: ACHIEVEMENT_MESSAGE_1
message.value: I've got a new achievement in Wormix: {achievement_name}! Don't believe? Come and play!

message.name: ACHIEVEMENT_MESSAGE_3
message.value: Rumors are told that {user_name} got an achievement {achievement_name} in Wormix. These aren't rumors actually. By the way, I'm very dangerous!

message.name: NEDD_AWARD_MSG
message.value: To unlock this equipment, you have to take rewards on previous levels

message.name: ACTIVITY_СALL_TO_PVP
message.value: My rating in Wormix: {rating}. {name}, come on, let's fight!

message.name: VIRAL_NEW_LEVEL
message.value: I got the {level} level in Wormix !

message.name: VIRAL_LETSFIGHT
message.value: My rating in Wormix: {rating}. I am ready to fight!

message.name: STATUS_TEXT
message.value: Do you yearn for new battles? Choose one of the following positions and your friends will respond!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_0
message.value: Enter Wormix. I will rupture anyone!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_1
message.value: Who wants to fight in Wormix? I am ready

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_2
message.value: My bazooka yearns for blood! See you in Wormix!

message.name: STATUS_CALL_REQUEST_3
message.value: I am expecting the challenge to fight a duel in Wormix!

message.name: AWARD_WEAPON_MESSAGE_1
message.value: Brand new weapon. You can't buy it, even with rubies!

message.name: AWARD_WEAPON_MESSAGE_2
message.value: Like my new stuff? It's awesome! Got it for achievement points.

message.name: AWARD_WEAPON_MESSAGE_3
message.value: Look and be envious. Available only for achievement points.

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_BONUS_DESCRIPTION
message.value: It was a hard fight, but you prevail! Here is the reward you deserve:

message.name: ONE_DAY_PANEL_NAME
message.value: Hooray! Victory! Now it's time to rest..

message.name: ONE_DAY_PANEL_DESCR
message.value: You can complete only one adventure every day.

message.name: HELP_LEARNING_MISSION_ITEM_MENU
message.value: We strongly recommend to complete the training before rushing to real battle.

message.name: LEVEL_NOT_APPROPRIATE_PANEL_NAME
message.value: You are brave! But that's not enough..

message.name: LEVEL_NOT_APPROPRIATE_PANEL_DESCR
message.value: Your level is too low for such serious battles!

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_LOSE_DESCR_1
message.value: This time your enemy is victorious! But the next time

message.name: LOSE_GAMEOVER_BOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: {boss_name} turned out to be stronger than {user_name}

message.name: BOSS_GAMEOVER_DRAW_DESCR
message.value: Quite uncommon, but the powers are equal! It's time to withdraw and rest.

message.name: DRAW_GAMEOVER_BOSS_MESSAGE
message.value: Quite uncommon, your powers are equal. Time to step back and rest.

message.name: NO_PATH_TEXT
message.value: You cannot attack this boss now, you have to clear the path first

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_PIRATE
message.value: I defeated the pirate Captain! So who's the terror of the sea now?

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ILLUSIONIST
message.value: I defeated the Illusionist! No more ridiculous tricks!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SHAMAN
message.value: I win! Shaman, they said. Even his demons are so pathetic.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_VIKING
message.value: Vikings are best fighters? I've totally owned them, though they had an advantage.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_WINDMASTER
message.value: So where's the Wind Master now? Blown away, as I came for him.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_MINER
message.value: I got rid of the Miner! Eventually, each miner meets his sapper.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SAMURAI_CAT
message.value: I defeated this cat. Nine times, to be exact!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_SERGEANT
message.value: Sergeant... I would've win even if he had 10 healers!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_BURNING_DEAD
message.value: Told them numerous times not to play with fire. Useless - had to handle it again!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_WANDERING_SOUL
message.value: Maybe if it would be Warrior, not Wandering Spirit, it could have a chance. Hmpf.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_YAKUZA
message.value: I defeated Yakuza! Not all of them, of course, but at least three bastards.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_DEAD_PIRATE
message.value: Water, meteors, ice spikes? Ha! Tactics, skill, flawless victory!

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ROMEO_JULIET
message.value: They say love kills... They don't know me yet.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_KING_DEAD
message.value: I waited for him to explode himself for so long... but he didn't. Had to help him.

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_ANCIENT_GHOST
message.value: Finally, a tough opponent!.. Unfortunately for him, I'm not afraid of the storm!

message.name: UNLOCK_BOSS_PANEL_TEXT
message.value: Are you sure you want to unlock this boss?

message.name: WALL_POST_PLAYER_WIN_BOSS_GUARDIANS_DEPTHS
message.value: I've defeated Guardians of the Depths!

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_MSG
message.value: Nobody to return, all your friends are actively playing! Kudos!

message.name: NOTIFY_RETURN_FRIEND
message.value: Don't hesitate, return to Wormix! And get your reward!

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCR_1
message.value: Ask your friends to return to Wormix!

message.name: RETURN_FRIENDS_MENU_DESCR_2
message.value: You'll get this reward for each friend, who accepts your invitation and returns to the game:

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REWARD_MENU_DESCR_1
message.value: Returned a friend? Get a deserved reward!

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REQUEST_MENU_DESCR
message.value: Express gratitude to the friend, which returned you back to the game!

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_REQUEST_MENU_MSG
message.value: Do you really want to send a reward to this friend?

message.name: RETURN_FRIEND_POST_MSG
message.value: I returned a friend back to the game and got my reward!

message.name: COMEBACK_POST_MSG
message.value: I returned to Wormix and got a reward!

message.name: NOT_TAKEN_AWARD_FOR_ACHIEV
message.value: You don't have any awards for achievements!

message.name: TITLE_RESET_AWARD_ACHIEV
message.value: Do you really want to reset awards for rubies?

message.name: UPDATE_YOUR_PLAYER
message.value: Please update your flash player to the latest version.

message.name: FRIEND_EXCEED_BATTLES
message.value: Your friend ran out of battles

message.name: FRIEND_MISSION_LOCKED
message.value: This boss is unavailable for your friend

message.name: NO_FRIENDS_FOR_COOP_MISSION
message.value: You have no friends online to attack this boss!

message.name: NOTIFY_ABOUT_INVITATION_QUESTION
message.value: Рассказать другу о том, что вы пригласили его в клан?

message.name: WALL_POST_CLAN_CREATE
message.value: Я командую кланом. А чего добился ты?

message.name: WALL_POST_JOINED_TO_CLAN
message.value: А нас — рать! Я вступил в клан.

message.name: WALL_POST_CLAN_EXTENDED
message.value: У меня стал больше. Померимся кланами?
